Sacrifice at Every Step.--We are nearing the end of this earth's history, and the different departments of God's work are to be carried forward with much more self-sacrifice than has yet been practiced. The work for these last days is a missionary work. Present truth, from the first to the last letter of its alphabet, means missionary effort. The work to be done calls for sacrifice at every step of advance. The workers are to 
                                                                           632
come forth from trial, purified and refined, as gold tried in the fire.--Review and Herald, Nov. 18, 1902.
